title: Base Configuration Schema
description: Defines the base-level configuration for operations such as downloading, uploading, and validating files from S3.

operations.description: List of operations this configuration enables (e.g. downloading, uploading, and validating).

s3Downloads.title: S3 Download Tasks
s3Downloads.description: List of files to download from S3.

name.description: A human-readable name or ID used for logging or environment variable naming.

s3Uri.description: S3 URI in the format s3://bucket/key from which to download the file.

destinationPath.description: Filesystem path where the downloaded file will be stored.

s3Uploads.title: S3 Upload Tasks
s3Uploads.description: Optional list of files to upload to S3 after processing.

name.description: Logical name for the upload task (used for logging or env variable lookup).

path.description: Path to the file on the container filesystem to be uploaded.

s3Uri.description: Destination S3 URI in the format s3://bucket/key.
